verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> for it is <S%H2896>good<s%> to sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to our <S%H430>God;<s%> for it is <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> and <S%H5000>fitting<s%> to praise <S%H8416>him.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> builds <S%H1129>up<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> He gathers <S%H3664>together<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
He <S%H7495>heals<s%> the <S%H7665>broken<s%> in <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and binds <S%H2280>up<s%> their <S%H6094>wounds.<s%>
He <S%H4487>counts<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars.<s%> He <S%H7121>calls<s%> them all by their <S%H8034>names.<s%>
<S%H1419>Great<s%> is our <S%H113>Lord,<s%> and <S%H7227>mighty<s%> in <S%H3581>power.<s%> His <S%H8394>understanding<s%> is <S%H4557>infinite.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5749>upholds<s%> the <S%H6035>humble.<s%> He <S%H8213>brings<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
<S%H6030>Sing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%> Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> on the <S%H3658>harp<s%> to our <S%H430>God,<s%>

who <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H8064>sky<s%> with <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> who <S%H3559>prepares<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> for the <S%H776>earth,<s%> who makes <S%H2682>grass<s%> <S%H6779>grow<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
He <S%H5414>provides<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> for the <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6158>ravens<s%> when they <S%H7121>call.<s%>
He <S%H2654>doesn't<s%> delight in the <S%H1369>strength<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse.<s%> He takes no <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H7785>legs<s%> of a <S%H376>man.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> takes <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3176>him,<s%> in those who hope in his loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%>
<S%H7623>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem!<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6726>Zion!<s%>
For he has <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates.<s%> He has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> inside <S%H7130>you.<s%>
He <S%H7760>makes<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in your <S%H1366>borders.<s%> He <S%H7646>fills<s%> you with the <S%H2459>finest<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat.<s%>
He sends <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H565>commandment<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%> His <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7323>runs<s%> very <S%H4120>swiftly.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H7950>snow<s%> like <S%H6785>wool,<s%> and <S%H6340>scatters<s%> <S%H3713>frost<s%> like <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
He hurls <S%H7993>down<s%> his <S%H7140>hail<s%> like <S%H6595>pebbles.<s%> Who can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H7135>cold?<s%>
He sends <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H4529>melts<s%> <S%H7307>them.<s%> He causes his wind to <S%H5380>blow,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5140>flow.<s%>
He <S%H5046>shows<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
He has not <S%H6213>done<s%> this for just any <S%H1471>nation.<s%> They <S%H3045>don't<s%> know his <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%>
